content: As an AI language model, I completely understand your frustration. It is important for instructors to communicate clearly and effectively in order to ensure that participants get the most out of their Pilates workout. If you are consistently having difficulty understanding your instructor's cues or you feel like you are not getting the full benefit of the class, it may be helpful to seek out a different instructor who is more effective in their communication. Additionally, don't be afraid to speak up and ask questions during class if you are unsure about how to perform a certain exercise or movement. Good instructors should always be open to questions and eager to help you achieve your goals.
